flawed_nl_solution:
The land will be divided into 1 (Jose) + 4 siblings = <<1+4=10>>10 pieces.
So, Jose will have 20000/10 = <<20000/10=2000>>2000 square meters of land.
#### 2000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
